PHRASE.LANG: Lil' Snow Peep has lost her sheep and needs a friend to guide her. As your Companion Peep she will follow you through out PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Lil'Snow Peep a perdu sa voie et a besoin d'un ami pour la guider. Comme ta compagne Peep, elle te suivra partout et sera ta copine.[#Legal]
Lil' Snow Peep hat ihr Schaf verloren und braucht einen Freund um sie zu führen. Als dein Freundschats-Peep wird sie dir zu Hause überall hin folgen und ist deine beste Freundin.[#Legal]
Lil' Snow Peep ha perso le sue pecore e ha bisogno di un'amico che la guidi. Come il tuo Companion Peep ti seguirá in casa e diventerá la tua migliore amica.[#Legal]
Lil' Snow Peep perdió su rebaño de ovejas y necesita un amigo que la pueda guiar. Como tu Companion Peep te seguirá en tu casa y será tu mejor cuate.[#Legal]
Lil' Snow Peep이 양을 잃어 버렸어요. 그녀를 안내해 줄 친구가 필요해요. 컴패니언 Peep으로 온 집안을 졸졸 따라다니며 당신의 가장 친한 친구가 되고 싶어합니다. [#Legal]
Lil' Snow Peep has lost her sheep and needs a friend to guide her. As your Companion Peep she will follow you through out PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Lil' Snow Peep遺失了她的羊，她需要朋友的幫助。作為您的隨身夥伴Peep，她會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Lil' Snow Peep遺失了她的羊，她需要朋友的幫助。作為您的隨身夥伴Peep，她會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Lil' Snow Peep has lost her sheep and needs a friend to guide her. As your Companion Peep she will follow you through out Home and will be your best buddy.[#Legal]
